# status

**Instance Property**

The status of the payment request that indicates whether authorization succeeds or fails.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus] for valid values.

## Updating authorization status

- **PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus**: General success and failure status for payment authorization.
